snippet: A severe thunderstorm in Chicago forced organizers of the Lollapalooza music festival to suspend all activities and evacuate an estimated 100,000 people from Grant Park on Saturday, The Associated Press reported.
abstract: Severe thunderstorm in Chicago forces organizers of the Lollapalooza music festival to suspend all activities and evacuate an estimated 100,000 people from Grant Park for more than two hours.
lead_paragraph: A severe thunderstorm in Chicago forced organizers of the Lollapalooza music festival to suspend all activities and evacuate an estimated 100,000 people from Grant Park on Saturday, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: A Stormy Lollapalooza Sends Fans Scurrying
headline.print_headline: A Stormy Lollapalooza Sends Fans Scurrying
